assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: All authors declare that they have no conflict of interests.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Written informed consent was obtained from the patients and/or their guardians prior to sample collection and open sural nerve biopsy.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This study was approved by the ethics committee of the Zhengzhou University First Hospital and was performed in accordance with the ethical standards laid down in the 1964 Declaration of Helsinki and its later amendments.
